entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:58 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 12:58 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
